data.title: North and South Carolina Auditions and Castings
data.meta_description: North and South Carolina Auditions. NYCastings provides castings and open calls in for film, TV, print, modeling, dance, theatre, in the Carolinas.
data.text:

Over 17 years, NYCastings has been working on notable projects such as The Wolf of Wall Street, Salt, Fame, The Devil Wears Prada,Â The Good Wife, Gotham,Â Newsies, Matilda, Kinky BootsÂ and thousand more.

Our clients are Production Companies, Casting Directors, Ad Agencies, Talent Agents & Managers.

How It Works For Talent

When you register as an NYCastings.com talent, you can then create your online resume and start submitting to the casting notices and agency listingsÂ right away from your phone or your desktop.

We make it very easy to submit so you can focus on your talent!

Proudly, we list more union andÂ non-union jobs in more areas of entertainment than any other comparable site, every day. Also, we update our Agents Directory weekly.

NYCastings.com hasÂ been an important staple in theÂ Production Community helping our clients inÂ Casting Talent & Crew on hundreds of productions a month. We are now known nationally bringing top quality Carolinas auditions and castings to our talent daily.
